verbs.description: assange sues [V: ecuador] over conditions to remain in london embassy wikileaks founder julian assange is suing ecuador foreign minister jose valencia over new rules of conduct imposed as a condition for him to remain at the country embassy in london according to his lawyer bloomberg london embassy assange ecuador
